See it work for this 3D plot without the hook:

```{r}
x <- seq(-100,100,0.1)
y <- seq(-100,100,0.1)
z <- (1 - (pmax(x,y))^2)^0.5
  
plot3d(x, y, z, col="skyblue")
```
